name: tiny-tiny-rss
description: Tiny Tiny RSS (tt-rss) is a self-hosted web-based RSS/Atom feed reader. It supports filters, plugins, multiple users, and mobile-friendly themes, giving full control over news aggregation.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Support multiple users with individual subscriptions, preferences, and reading history

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create powerful filters to automatically tag, mark, or hide articles based on content or source

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for features like sharing, archiving, or custom integrations

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access feeds from mobile devices with responsive themes optimized for touch interfaces

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Share interesting articles via email, social media, or custom sharing services

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Import and export feed subscriptions using standard OPML format for portability
